verses.roman:
vṛndāvana-dāsa kaila 'caitanya-maṅgala'
yāṅhāra śravaṇe nāśe sarva amaṅgala

synonyms: vṛndāvana-dāsa—of the name Vṛndāvana dāsa; kaila—compiled; caitanya-maṅgala—the book named Caitanya-maṅgala; yāṅhāra—of which; śravaṇe—by hearing; nāśe—annihilated; sarva—all; amaṅgala—inauspiciousness.
translation: Ṭhākura Vṛndāvana dāsa has composed Śrī Caitanya-maṅgala. Hearing this book annihilates all misfortune.
